com.here.msdkui.guidance

Class GuidanceNextManeuverPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.msdkui.guidance.base.BaseGuidancePresenter
      • com.here.msdkui.guidance.GuidanceNextManeuverPresenter

  • public class GuidanceNextManeuverPresenter
extends BaseGuidancePresenter
    A class that creates GuidanceNextManeuverData during guidance. This data can be fed into GuidanceNextManeuverView to inform the user about maneuver to take after current one. You must call resume() to start listening for guidance events. GuidanceNextManeuverListener.onDataChanged(GuidanceNextManeuverData).
